Latest • v2026.2.17

OpenClaw Release v2026.2.17

Curated highlights only—no legacy docs. Built with modern motion, WebGL depth, and clean, technical clarity.

View on GitHub See Features

01 Platform & Models

Anthropic 1M Context (Opt-in)

Add `params.context1m: true` for Opus/Sonnet (maps to `anthropic-beta: context-1m-2025-08-07`).

params: { context1m: true }

Claude Sonnet 4.6 Support

Aliases/defaults updated with forward-compat fallback when upstream catalogs still expose 4.5.

thinkingDefault Overrides

Per-model `thinkingDefault` now configurable in model config.

llms.txt Discovery Enabled

Default behavior now discovers llms.txt for better context and compliance.

02 Orchestration & Subagents

/subagents spawn

Deterministic subagent activation from chat commands for precise task routing.

Context Guards

Preemptively compact and truncate oversized tool outputs to prevent context-window overflow.

Source Context Preservation

Spawned subagent task messages are prefixed with context to preserve origin information.

03 Channels & Streaming

Slack Native Streaming

Single-message text streaming with `chat.startStream`/`appendStream`/`stopStream`, with robust fallbacks.

Telegram UX Upgrades

Inline button styles and reaction events; improved runtime guidance and action parsing.

Discord Exec & Components

Expose native `/exec` options and reusable interactive components with per-button allowlists.

iMessage replyTo Support

Outbound text/media `replyToId` and normalized leading reply tags for targeted responses.

04 Scheduling & Ops

Cron Stagger & Telemetry

Deterministic default stagger, per-job usage telemetry, and improved reporting for stable scheduling.

Webhook Delivery Modes

Per-job webhook delivery separated from announce flows; strict validation and legacy fallback.

Docker Browser Install Flag

Optional OPENCLAW_INSTALL_BROWSER preinstalls Chromium + Xvfb to avoid runtime Playwright installs.
